hello tina may

oh hey there

There are 86,400 seconds in every day. I'm on a mission to discover ways to make the most out of each and every one of them. From entrepreneurship and lifestyle design enabling me to live a location-independent life in Bali, to health and wellness hacks that give me more energy and productivity I'm exploring it all. Want to come along for the ride?

work with me

I've worked with small businesses and startups all over the world helping them with their marketing, customer experience and digital strategy. In 2 years with no external funding I grew my startup, Institute of Code, to over $500k in revenue and have taught over 250 students from around the world ... it's been a rollercoaster of a journey, and sharing the lessons I've learned as well as being honest and vulnerable about the struggles is something that I am so passionate about. I'm available for speaking engagements to large and small crowds, startup and marketing consulting, and the occaisional web development project. Think you have a project that might be a good fit? Let's chat.
